es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.facade.strategy
Class DistributionStrategy

java.lang.Object
  es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.observer.ObservableModelUpdater
      es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.facade.strategy.DistributionStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelUpdaterObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicDistributionStrategy, HybridDistributionStrategy, ImprovedDynamicDistributionStrategy, StaticDistributionStrategy
public abstract class DistributionStrategy
extends ObservableModelUpdater
implements ModelUpdaterObserver

This class provides the strategy template for distribute the models amongst processors, the concrete classes should both distribute models and compute likelihood values.

Constructor Detail

DistributionStrategy

public DistributionStrategy(int mpjMe,
                            int mpjSize,
                            ApplicationOptions options,
                            CheckPointManager cpManager)
Instantiates a new distribution strategy with Checkpointing support.

Parameters:
mpjMe - the rank of the current process in MPJ
mpjSize - the size of the MPJ communicator
options - the application options
cpManager - the checkpoint manager, it can be null if checkpointing is not supported
Method Detail

distribute

public abstract Model[] distribute(ModelCollection modelSet,
                                   ModelWeightComparator comparator)
Method called by the root process in order to distribute the models amongst processors.

Parameters:
modelSet - the models to distribute
comparator - implementation of the heuristic algorithm for sort and distribute models
Returns:
the array of models after computing likelihood
